articles.title: Africa Cup of Nations: Chaos as referee ends game early TWICE and Tunisia refuse to play against Mali - Eurosport COM

articles.title: South African indigenous 'king' arrested for growing pot at presidency - Guardian Nigeria
articles.description: South African police Wednesday uprooted cannabis plants grown by indigenous activists who have camped outside President Cyril Ramaphosa's office for more than three years, AFP reporters saw.
